output_response: Hi there, how can I help?

Open the Aarogya Setu app turn on location and bluetooth. Tap on CoWIN on top right of the screen. Tap on Vaccination(Login/Register). Enter Mobilie Number. Tap on proceed to verify. You will receive an otp. Enter otp and proceed to verify.If using for first time enter your details and register
You can call me KONNEX ASSISTANT.

Login/Register into Aarogya Setu app. Beside your name under the action column tap on the calender icon. Enter your pin code or search with state,district and block.Select the appropriate centre and book your slot
Everyday from 10 AM to 5 PM. You can book morning or evening slot based on your preference
